text: Displayed coupon that I purchased from a high school student. Papa John's did not honor it.... what lanes they are. Excuse was that they are owned by someone else. Lol do not waste your time going here. Same old papa John's...... back to their old ways smh

name: Jorge Perez
text: Always well made, daughter's softball team beat the 1st place team after having some, looks like they need fuel between games!

name: Jose M Lopez
text: Fresh and warm pizza at my preferable toppings. Best taste for me.

name: Elias Barber
text: This place made about the best pizza I ever ate! The crust is crisp and not too tough.

name: Amy Amy
text: They finally opened up again ! I'm very happy to have a papa John's closer to me. I appreciate the deals they have and the hard work they are putting to bring customers. I have been pretty satisfied with my orders so give them a chance and order your pizza today ! Lol

name: Cedrick Reynolds
text: Absolutely one of the rudest places in Pomona, I stood at the counter for 30 seconds before an employee chose to greet me. The pizza had very minimal toppings and my pepperoni was burnt to a crisp.

text: Papa John's pizza has a better taste to it.

text: Yasss! I see a lot of change. Better food quality , better employees and well kept.

name: Randy Kirk
text: I drove by the other night and ordered at the counter. Everyone was nice and the pizza was perfect. I like mine thicker crust and the cheese just a bit brown and that's how it came.

text: Love it here fast service not to mention the quality of the pizza absolutely wonderful kids first time having papa John's and they loved it we will definitely keep coming back .

text: This place is bipolar. One minute it's perfect with extra cheese. The next they're harassing about the pizza being made wrong. So much for loyalty. If I was a food critic they would be shut down by now.

text: Cashier verify my order thru the T-Mobile Tuesday closed my order couldn't find my pizza.  He even told me the ingredients and for some reason couldn't find me.  Wasted 20 minutes there just to walk out with a sorry.  Next time I rather go to the other  one horrible communication service.
